Azure geographies

Each Azure geography contains one or more regions and meets specific data residency and compliance requirements. This lets you keep your business-critical data and apps nearby on fault-tolerant, high-capacity networking infrastructure.

    Get all of the information you need to get started on Azure in the geography that best fits your needs, from compliance to resiliency features. Select an Azure geography using the drop-down menu and compare to other geographies nearby.1

    Italy

    Microsoft announces its first cloud region in Italy, accelerating innovation and economic opportunity.

    Poland

    Microsoft announces the opening of its newest trusted cloud region and the first in Central and Eastern Europe, located in Poland, near Warsaw.

    Qatar

    Micrsosoft opens a new datacentre region in Qatar, part of a government effort to build a knowledge-based economy.

    China

    Microsoft announces the general availability of Azure Availability Zones from our China North 3 datacentre region.

    Belgium

    Microsoft announces intent to establish its first datacentre region in Belgium.

    Norway

    West US 3

    Microsoft launches newest, most sustainable datacentre region to date, located in Arizona.

    Malaysia

    Microsoft announces plans for its first cloud datacentre region in Malaysia.

    Indonesia

    Microsoft to establish new datacentre region in Indonesia, along with broad skilling programme.

    Georgia

    Microsoft to expand US datacentre and Availability Zones presence into the state of Georgia.

    Chile

    Microsoft announces "Transforma Chile" to accelerate growth and business transformation, including a new datacentre region.

    Denmark

    Microsoft announces plans to establish a new datacentre region in Denmark to accelerate the country’s green, digital transformation.

    Taiwan

    Microsoft to establish its first datacentre region in Taiwan as a part of its "Reimagine Taiwan" initiative.

    Austria

    Microsoft announces plans to establish its first cloud region in Austria to accelerate local innovation and growth.

    Greece

    Microsoft announces plans for first datacentre region in Greece as part of “GR for GRowth” digital transformation initiative.

    New Zealand

    New Microsoft initiatives in New Zealand include a new Azure datacentre region and support for employment training.

    Spain

    Microsoft to open new datacentre region in Spain and expand strategic partnership with Telefónica to boost Spain's competitiveness.

    Mexico

    The Mexico datacentre region is part of a digital transformation initiative that includes technical education projects.

    Israel

    Microsoft announces plans to establish its first Azure datacentre region in Israel, delivering intelligent, trusted cloud services.
